member.name: P:Elect.Web.Consul.Models.ElectConsulOptions.ServiceEndpoint
member.summary: Service endpoint for Consul connect to the service.
member.remarks: This endpoint must valid URI, if not set will use the running localhost with port.

member.name: F:Elect.Web.Consul.Models.ElectConsulOptions.DeregisterDeadServiceAfter
member.summary: Deregister dead service after a period, default is 5 mins.

member.name: P:Elect.Web.Consul.Models.ElectConsulOptions.IsFabioEnable
member.summary:
If enable, will add Tag: $"urlprefix-/{} strip=/{}" to support the Fabio Load Balancing.
Default is true.

member.name: P:Elect.Web.Consul.Models.ElectConsulOptions.FabioEndpoint
member.summary: Domain of Fabio - Load Balancing Service. Default is "http://127.0.0.1:9999"
